thread.title: East Mississippi Community College coach suspended
thread.title_full: East Mississippi Community College coach suspended - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: cbs8
title: East Mississippi Community College coach suspended
text:
JACKSON, Miss. (AP) - East Mississippi Community College football coach Buddy Stephens has been given a two-game suspension after an on-field altercation with a game administrator during the Lions' 48-24 win over Itawamba Community College.
The Clarion-Ledger reports ( http://on.thec-l.com/1O6MHam ) the sideline scuffle occurred in the fourth quarter of last Saturday's game. Video shows the game administrator can be seen throwing his clipboard and appears to swing at Stephens. Stephens then appears to swing at the administrator as he moves toward the official before being restrained.
EMCC President Thomas M. Huebner, Jr., in a statement Wednesday, said while he believes Stephens didn't initiate contact, he responded in a manner "not consistent with our institutional expectations" and issued the suspension.
Mississippi Association of Community & Junior Colleges officials did not return a telephone call for comment.
Information from: The Clarion-Ledger, http://www.clarionledger.com
